Items.Title: Application number C 250036 HAK (Brownsville NCP) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 425 Mother Gaston Boulevard (Block 3743, Lot 12), 546 Thomas S. Boyland Street (Block 3518, Lot 63), and 1733-1735 Saint Mark’s Avenue (Block 1455, Lots 65, 66, and 79) as an Urban Development Action Area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 16, Council Districts 37 and 41.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application number C 250037 ZMK (Brownsville NCP) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 17c, changing from an M1-1 District to an R7A District and establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 16, Council Districts 37 and 41.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application number N 250038 ZRK (Brownsville NCP) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 16, Council Districts 37 and 41.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
